item.name: Add Appointment with one of Suggested Doctor

request.description:
Booked appointment with one of suggested doctor

when patient with given patient id used this api, then based on patient city and sysymptom one doctor is appointed to patient

if patient not in the mention city then it give message " we are expanding our network"

if doctor with given symptoms not found then it give " doctor with given symptom is not present"
patient can book appointment with any doctor using doctor id and patient id
we get data of appointment booked by given patient with patient id
we get list of appointment booked for particular doctor with doctorid
